class kpstat.StatsExecutor(filepath, sep=', ', header=0)[source]¶

Perform many tests on one data at once.

Inputs are path of file, separator and header (0-no header, 1-header present). To print out summary, type analysis_name.print_results(). To write html or txt summary, type type analysis_name.write_txt() or analysis_name.write_tho()

prepare_complex_multilayer_container()[source]¶

Prepares container for tests that compare different columns, requires

print_results()[source]¶

Main method for printing analysis results in console. Obviously requires launching analysis first

print_summary()[source]¶

Prints out summary table

write_html(name='result.html')[source]¶

Main method for creating html formatted results

write_summary()[source]¶

Writes summary for write_txt method

write_summary_html()[source]¶

Generates html header and formatted summary table

write_txt(name='result.txt')[source]¶

Writes summary to text file, input is filename
